Sections.Name: Quest&IslandOptions
Sections.Description: Settings For Quest Dungeons And Islands

Keys.Name: QuestDungeons
Keys.Description: Allows Quest Dungeons To Be Spawned In || Default = False

Keys.Name: IsolatedIslandDungeons
Keys.Description: Allows Dungeons To Be Spawned In Located On Uninhabited Islands || Default = True

Keys.Name: PopulatedIslandDungeons
Keys.Description: Allows Dungeons To Be Spawned In Located On Inhabited Islands || Default = True

Sections.Name: ClimateOptions
Sections.Description: Settings For Allowed Dungeon Location Climate Types To Spawn In

Keys.Name: Ocean
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Ocean Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: Desert
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Desert Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: HotDesert
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Hot Desert Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: Mountain
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Mountain Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: Rainforest
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Rainforest Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: Swamp
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Swamp Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: Subtropical
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Subtropical Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: MountainWoods
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Mountain Woods Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: Woodlands
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Woodlands Climate || Default = True

Keys.Name: HauntedWoodlands
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Located In Haunted Woodlands Climate || Default = True

Sections.Name: DungeonTypeOptions
Sections.Description: Settings For Allowed Dungeon Types To Spawn In

Keys.Name: ScorpionNest
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Scorpion Nest || Default = True

Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Volcanic Caves || Default = True

Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Barbarian Stronghold || Default = True

Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Dragons Den || Default = True

Keys.Name: GiantStronghold
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Giant Stronghold || Default = True

Keys.Name: SpiderNest
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Spider Nest || Default = True

Keys.Name: RuinedCastle
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Ruined Castle || Default = True

Keys.Name: HarpyNest
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Harpy Nest || Default = True

Keys.Name: Laboratory
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Laboratory || Default = True

Keys.Name: VampireHaunt
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Vampire Haunt || Default = True

Keys.Name: Coven
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Coven || Default = True

Keys.Name: NaturalCave
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Natural Cave || Default = True

Keys.Name: Mine
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Mine || Default = True

Keys.Name: DesecratedTemple
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Desecrated Temple || Default = True

Keys.Name: Prison
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Prison || Default = True

Keys.Name: HumanStronghold
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Human Stronghold || Default = True

Keys.Name: OrcStronghold
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Orc Stronghold || Default = True

Keys.Name: Crypt
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Crypt || Default = True

Keys.Name: Cemetery
Keys.Description: Allows Being Spawned In Dungeons Of Type Cemetery || Default = False

Sections.Name: StartDateOptions
Sections.Description: Settings For If You Want To Start New Games With A Random Date

Keys.Name: RandomStartingDate
Keys.Description: Allows New Games To Randomly Choose A Starting Date

Keys.Name: WinterMonths
Keys.Description: Random Date Can Be Within The Winter Months

Keys.Name: SpringMonths
Keys.Description: Random Date Can Be Within The Spring Months

Keys.Name: SummerMonths
Keys.Description: Random Date Can Be Within The Summer Months

Keys.Name: FallMonths
Keys.Description: Random Date Can Be Within The Fall Months

Keys.Name: SafeZone
Keys.Description: Default = 30 || Changes Size Of Safe Zone Cleared Of Enemies Upon Spawning. 0 = Disabled, 200 = Huge
